banner.title: Leave a review
banner.subtitle: Your voice matters! Share your thoughts safely and anonymously, and help the company get better.

elon.name: Elon Musk
elon.message: I learned a lot about my employees and fired more than half.

sadyr.name: Sadyr Japarov
sadyr.message: The app is simple but useful. The main thing is not to be afraid to leave honest feedback.

said.name: Said Davlatov
said.message: Fast and convenient, no need to go through a lot of bureaucracy to get your point across.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Anonimo is a platform for anonymous feedback and corporate atmosphere analysis. It helps organizations get honest employee opinions through anonymous surveys, chats, and analytics, which contributes to improving internal communication and making informed management decisions.
faq.q2: How to start using the service?
faq.a2: To get started, register on the platform as a user or administrator. Administrators can create teams, launch surveys, and view analytics. Users can take surveys, participate in anonymous discussions, and share opinions without the risk of being identified.
faq.q3: What features are available on the platform?
faq.a3: The platform includes: anonymous surveys, survey templates, results analytics, analysis documents, participant and role management. Administrators can track overall dynamics, while employees can anonymously share their opinions.
faq.a4: We don't store personal data, don't link responses to specific users, and use randomization and aggregation technologies. All messages and responses go through a system that prevents personal identification.
faq.a5: All data is transmitted and stored using modern encryption algorithms. We regularly conduct security checks and comply with information protection standards to ensure platform confidentiality and reliability.
faq.q6: Can I test Anonimo before purchasing?
faq.a6: Yes, you can use a free demo version. It includes basic features: creating one survey, limited number of participants, and access to basic analytics.
faq.q7: What tariffs and payment methods are available?
faq.a7: We have a free and several paid tariffs — depending on team size and required functionality. Payment can be made by bank card, electronic wallets, or cryptocurrency. Details are in the 'Pricing' section.
faq.a8: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your personal account. After cancellation, you can use the service until the end of the paid period. Data and survey history are preserved if you decide to return later.
